post.author: John Ko
post.content:
I just forward my mail that I received today...

>>>
Hi,
Can I ask for your help?
I Found your info in Workopolis, and wondered if you
were looking for new opportunities in Embedded
Development...
If not, please keep my contact info for the future,
and pass this email on to a friend.
As thanks, please see the reference links at the
bottom of this email....


1. Three Software Designers: 05-5134  Contract to
April 2006 (6+mo)

Montreal
  
• Tools to configure the network elements of
cellular and two way radio infrastructure
• Software applications for public safety that
utilize the wireless communications networks.
• Test and load tools for various network elements
(cellular and two way radio)

Software projects are executed by teams ranging in
size from 2 to 30 engineers led by a Project
Manager.

Needed:
RTOS Software development (eg VxWorks, pSoS, Linux
derivatives)

Exposure to the use of low level troubleshooting
tools such as logic analyzers, oscilloscopes,
Labview etc.

Exposure to working on platforms such as RISC H/W
platform (PowerPC QUICC) and MPC 860.



2. CDMA Software Designer: 05-4510

Abstract: We have an immediate 6+ month contract
requirement with a telecommunications client in
Calgary for a CDMA Software Designer. Minimum
Competencies Required: 5+ years of software
development experience with 3+ years of C and C++ in
an embedded real-time OS.


3. Kitchener Perm Job - Embedded Developer  (up to
80K)

Computer Science, Engineering, or similar
5 years real experience in object oriented software
design using C++
Excellent communication skills

Desired Experience:
Java programming experience
Enterprise software experience, XML, SOAP, RMI, etc.

Image Processing/Machine Vision experience
Experience with Matrox Imaging Library
High-level experience with computer hardware
---------------


Please send a resume, or contact me for further
info.
I will reply to all submissions. Thanks for your
interest in this!

Thanks,
Chris Richmond
BScH, MCSE, MCDBA IT Recruiter
Ian Martin Ltd.
905-815-1600 x 2276


Reference site:
www.pc104.ca

Jobs:
See More details for my current Embedded Job
Postings that I'm working on...
http://www.pc104.ca/oem/industrial-computer.asp
This is an RSS feed you can subscribe to!

Free Training:
www.brainbench.com/xml/bb/common/testcenter/freetests.xml
post.title: Jobs for Embeded Software Developers
